description: Single-agent workflow for engaging website visitors with AI-powered marketing assistant

agents.name: Website Marketing Agent
agents.description: Engages website visitors, answers questions about services/pricing/availability using business knowledge base, qualifies leads, and guides prospects toward completing bookings with persuasive yet helpful responses
agents.trigger: Chat message submission on Website Chat Widget

knowledge_bases.name: DockedAI Business Information
knowledge_bases.description: Contains business information, FAQs, services, pricing, and availability details for the website marketing chatbot
